Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Board = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local damage = 16
local bg
local slowCo = nil
local torsoFrame = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local spin = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spin") while spin == nil do wait() spin = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spin") end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function slow(humanoid) if humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 12.0 wait(3.0) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if slowCo == nil or coroutine.status(slowCo) == "dead" then slowCo = coroutine.create(function() slow(humanoid) end) coroutine.resume(slowCo) end end end end
function boardUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function boardDown() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1 , 0) end
function cyclone() if myTorso == nil then return end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoFrame[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoFrame[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 150 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg and torsoFrame[c] then bg.cframe = torsoFrame[c] end wait() end if bg then bg:Remove() end end
function destroyEverything() local sign = 1 local missiles = {} spin = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spin") if spin and spin.Value == 1 then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
laughSound = Board:FindFirstChild("Laugh") if laughSound then laughSound:Play() end
local initDirection = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(cyclone))
boardDown() -- wait(5.0) boardUp() if bg then bg:Remove() end wait(30.0) spin.Value = 0 end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() torsoFrame = {} if bg then bg:Remove() end end
spin.Changed:connect(destroyEverything)
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Board.Touched:connect(blow)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Board = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local spin
local slashAnim local slamSound
Tool.Enabled = true
function choiceIsYours(key) if vCharacter == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end key = key:lower() if key == "q" then spin = Tool:FindFirstChild("Spin") if spin and spin.Value == 0 then spin.Value = 1 end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end Tool.Enabled = false tick() local slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.RightSlash) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end slamSound = Board:FindFirstChild("SlamSound") wait(0.1) if slamSound then slamSound:Play() end wait(1.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(choiceIsYours) end end
function onUnequipped() -- do nothing if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if slamSound then slamSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
